title: How to Make a Breakfast Special Smoothie

steps.headline: Chop and juice the apples.
steps.description: Pour the apple juice into the blender.

steps.headline: Cut the banana into slices.
steps.description: Add the slices to the blender.

steps.headline: Measure and pour the muesli and yogurt into the blender.
Pour and serve into your glass.

text: Chop and juice the apples. Pour the apple juice into the blender. Cut the banana into slices. Add the slices to the blender. Measure and pour the muesli and yogurt into the blender.  Blend for about 20 seconds.  Pour and serve into your glass. Enjoy!
